title: LF RANKED 5 TEAM ( SERIOUS )
body: Looking for a ranked 5 team, Main ADC, support top or mid but mainly adc . Currently ranked gold 3 previous season was plat. Hoping for a gold team or higher that is serious and always active. Add me if interested ign Sultan.

replies.body: hey their  i play top lane, jungle, aswell as adc at a deent lvl. i also am a thresh support main well was in season 4 play about 100 games of him. I also have 2 gold 5 accounts. I rcently just lost my promos ;/ I will be able 2 play alot{{champion:17}}
